Returns: a Type object representing the component type of this array
Throws: if the underlying array type's component type refers to a non-existent type declaration
if the underlying array type's component type refers to a parameterized type that cannot be instantiated for any reason
getGenericComponentType().Description: Returns a Type object representing the component type of this array. This method creates the component type of the array. See the declaration of @B_java#lang#reflect#ParameterizedType_E@ for the semantics of the creation process for parameterized types and see @B_java#lang#reflect#TypeVariable_E@ for the creation process for type variables.

ClassDesc: GenericArrayType represents an array type whose component type is either a parameterized type or a type variable.
